content: The following are the national records in speed skating in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) maintained by the Singapore Ice Skating Association (SISA). ## Men EventRecordAthleteDateMeetPlaceRef500 meters500 meters × 21000 meters1500 meters3000 meters5000 meters10000 metersTeam pursuit (8 laps)Sprint combinationSmall combinationBig combination ## Women EventRecordAthleteDateMeetPlaceRef500 meters42.81[Cheyenne Goh](/wiki/Cheyenne_Goh)15 March 2019Olympic Oval Finale[Calgary](/wiki/Olympic_Oval), Canada500 meters × 21000 meters1500 meters3000 meters5000 meters10000 metersTeam pursuit (6 laps)Sprint combinationMini combinationSmall combination - SISA website
title: List of Singaporean records in speed skating
